name: Personalized Gold IP Plate Cross Stainless Steel Ring

reviews.name: Personalized Gold IP Plate Cross Stainless Steel Ring
reviews.reviewText: My husband loves this ring! It is even more beatiful in person and the personalization is great! The edges of the ring are a little rough, but my husband says that it doesn't bother him at all. The engraving is not quite as dark as shown in the picture, but it still came out great. We both really love this ring and I am so glad that I chose this ring for him!
reviews.title: Just Wonderful!

reviews.name: Personalized Gold IP Plate Cross Stainless Steel Ring
reviews.title: Nice

reviews.name: Personalized Gold IP Plate Cross Stainless Steel Ring
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to do something out-of-the-box for my boyfriend. he is talking about proposing or giving me a promise ring next year. I wanted him to know how much i loved him so i too wanted to give him a ring, after he surprises me with mine, lol. Could not afford a lot, thus I was so happy to receive this lovely ring for him :-) for under $50.00 Wish I could have wrote our names out in full but there was not enough space. overall, very happy :-)
reviews.title: Every Nice Ring
